Write-Up Text: Australia's Federal budget was highlighted across social media where people expressed their reactions. Labour's budget was delivered and criticised for having nuances that need to be analysed. However Treasurer Jim Chalmers' budget provided Australians with the largest boost to the Commonwealth Rent Assistance program in over 30 years. Additionally millions of people will be receiving Centrelink payments with a financial boost after the budget is passed. The housing market is receiving some relief with a Home Guarantee scheme expanding its criteria for first-home buyers and a 15% increase in the maximum rate of the Commonwealth Rent Assistance program.
